title: Jim Wasco
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055143/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055143/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Jim Wasco**

Jim Wasco was a long-time type production staffer at [Adobe Systems](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055143/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe%20Systems). Following a round of layoffs in 2002, he landed at [Monotype Imaging Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055143/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype%20Imaging%20Inc.), for whom he soon headed up their [Redwood City](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055143/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Redwood%20City), CA development office. He is the designer of Harmonia Sans, ITC Elegy, and co-designer with [Min Wang](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055143/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Min%20Wang) of the Adobe Original typeface "Mythos," a fanciful all-caps design featuring monsters and creatures shaped into letters.
author: Thomas Phinney
